```{r survey_data, include=FALSE}
# libraries
library(flextable)
library(janitor)
library(dplyr)

# get the question data, from export_data_not_shiny.R
directory = 'U:/Research/Projects/ihbi/aushsi/aushsi_barnetta/NHMRC/research_on_research/research_prioritisation/data/'
f1 = paste(directory, 'questions.RData', sep='')
f2 = paste(directory, 'votes.RData', sep='')
load(f1)
load(f2) # get the voting data
```


## <small>Gathering questions</small>{background-image='figures/submit_questions.jpg' background-size='cover'}

## Who did we reach out to?

* Future Campus

* NHMRC

* LinkedIn

* Twitter/X

* METASERV listserv

Stared in April 2024

## Who provided the questions?

23 respondents in total

:::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="60%"}

#### Respondents' background

```{r table_respondents}
data = select(long_with_response, response_id, q7, q8) %>%
  unique() # just one response per person 
# 
tab = filter(data, !is.na(q7)) %>% # remove missing
  tabyl(q7) %>%
  arrange(desc(n)) %>% # order
  adorn_totals() %>% # add total
  mutate(percent = round(percent*100)) %>%
  rename('Answer' = 'q7') 
ftab = flextable(tab) %>%
  theme_box() %>%
  autofit() %>%
  fontsize(size=18, part='all') %>%
  color(part='all', color='white')
ftab
```


:::
